name: Big Trouble in Little Toilet Town
name_original: Big Trouble in Little Toilet Town
description:
This is a simple button mashing game, alternate between X and Z to take steps, and then either press space to relieve yourself or let it come naturally after the timer runs down.

Music isn't My strong suit hope to have a better song before the end of the Jam, for the time being if the song isn't to your liking you can press M to stop or restart the music.

Might make a more fun sequel if people want

Everything was made by me
